src:
Sir Lindsay Hoyle (62) ny leder i Underhuset
Tar over etter John Bercow som leder for det britiske Underhuset.
04 Nov 2019, 20:33 by NTB I
Valget av ny leder var eneste post på programmet da parlamentarikerne kom på jobb mandag. På formiddagen var den offisielle kandidatlisten klar, og der sto det sju navn.
Lindsay Hoyle fra Labour var favoritten, men det tok fire langdryge runder å velge ham.
Det var hemmelig skriftlig valg, der minst én kandidat elimineres i hver runde. Det holdes så mange runder som det trengs for at noen skal få mer enn 50 prosent av stemmene. I den fjerde og siste runden fikk Hoyle 325 av 540 stemmer, det vil si 60 prosent. Dermed var seieren et faktum da klokken nærmet seg 20.30 i London.
Den siste gjenværende motkandidaten, Hoyles partifelle Chris Bryant, fikk 213 stemmer. To stemmer var ugyldige.
text:
Sir Lindsay Hoyle (62) new leader in the House of Commons
Takes over after John Bercow as head of the British House of Commons.
04 Nov 2019, 20:33 by NTB I
The election of a new leader was the only entry on the program when parliamentarians came to work on Monday. In the morning the official list of candidates was ready, and there were seven names.
Labor's Lindsay Hoyle was the favorite, but it took four long-lap rounds to pick him.
It was a secret written choice, eliminating at least one candidate in each round. There are as many rounds as needed to get more than 50 percent of the vote. In the fourth and final round, Hoyle received 325 out of 540 votes, ie 60 percent. Thus the victory was a fact as the clock approached 20.30 in London.
The last remaining opponent, Hoyle's party mate Chris Bryant, got 213 votes. Two votes were invalid.
